articles.author: Joshua Posaner
articles.title: Berlin blames Taurus call leak on officer logging in via insecure Singapore hotel line - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Germany is scrambling to clean up the damage following an embarrassing leak of secret information to the Russians.
articles.content: The U.K. also reacted with dismay to the leak, where the officers discussed how the British and French were delivering cruise missiles to Ukraine, with Gräfe apparently saying: "If we're asked about … [+1084 chars]

articles.title: Spotify Lauds $2 Billion EU Fine, Says Apple Has 'Muzzled' Streaming Music Services - MacRumors
articles.description: Apple was today fined €1.8 billion ($1.95 billion) for anti-competitive conduct against rival streaming music services in the European Union, and...
articles.content: Apple was today fined 1.8 billion ($1.95 billion) for anti-competitive conduct against rival streaming music services in the European Union, and following the ruling, Spotify has praised the European… [+2883 chars]
